item.title: EU Trade
item.description: Single Market The single market is a huge benefit to all member states … … is an extract from this report … (http://www.amchameu.eu/sites/default/files/amcham_eu_single_market_web.pdf) Trade deals Here is a link to the official EU page on trade agreements … (https://ec.europa.eu/trade/policy/countries-and-regions/negotiations-and-agreements/index_en.htm) A full list of countries and their trade status … (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_Union_free_trade_agreements)
